it's just because I know you guys are fighting,"},{"lineNumber":116484,"originalJapaneseLine":"　知ってるからそう見えるだけか」","translatedEnglishLine":"that's why you just look that bellybutton.\""},{"lineNumber":116489,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ユキちゃん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yuki-chan!\""},{"lineNumber":116490,"originalJapaneseLine":"「およ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh?\""},{"lineNumber":116491,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あれー？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh—?"},{"lineNumber":116492,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ユキちゃんと絶賛絶交状態の","translatedEnglishLine":"Isn't that Kaen-chan, who's currently in a full-on break-up state with Yuki-chan☆"},{"lineNumber":116493,"originalJapaneseLine":"　火炎ちゃんじゃないですかー☆」","translatedEnglishLine":"\""},{"lineNumber":116494,"originalJapaneseLine":"「絶交してるのに声かけても――」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even though you’re in a break-up, talking to her—\""},{"lineNumber":116495,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":116496,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　＜どさっ＞","translatedEnglishLine":"  <Thud>"},{"lineNumber":116497,"originalJapaneseLine":"火炎書士がユキに抱きついた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kaen, the fire mage, hugged Yuki tightly."},{"lineNumber":116498,"originalJapaneseLine":"「火炎ちゃん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kaen-chan?\""},{"lineNumber":116499,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うっ、ぐすっ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, sniff...\""},{"lineNumber":116500,"originalJapaneseLine":"　うううう〜……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uuuu...\""},{"lineNumber":116501,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":116502,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うぇえぇえええ〜〜〜……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Waaahhhhh...\""},{"lineNumber":116503,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":116504,"originalJapaneseLine":"「コオロギ食べる？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Want to eat some crickets?\""},{"lineNumber":116505,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うぅん、食べない」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, I don't want to.\""},{"lineNumber":116506,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ごめんね、ごめんね……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm sorry, I'm sorry...\""},{"lineNumber":116507,"originalJapaneseLine":"　意地を張ったりしちゃって……","translatedEnglishLine":"I was stubborn and stuff..."},{"lineNumber":116508,"originalJapaneseLine":"　火炎が悪かったの……ごめんね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"It was Kaen's fault... I'm sorry...\""},{"lineNumber":116509,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うっ、うううう〜〜〜！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, uuuuu...!\""},{"lineNumber":116510,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おーよしよし。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, there, there."},{"lineNumber":116511,"originalJapaneseLine":"　泣け、わめけ、ユキちゃんの胸で」","translatedEnglishLine":"Cry, scream, here on Yuki-chan's chest.\""},{"lineNumber":116512,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うええぇえええ〜〜〜……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Waaahhhh...!\""},{"lineNumber":116513,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐすっ、ごめんね……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sniff, I'm sorry..."},{"lineNumber":116514,"originalJapaneseLine":"　火炎のこと、許してくれる？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Will you forgive Kaen?\""},{"lineNumber":116515,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":116516,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいよ☆」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's okay☆\""},{"lineNumber":116517,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、えへへ……良かったぁ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, ehehe... I'm glad...\""},{"lineNumber":116518,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、総統。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, Commander."},{"lineNumber":116519,"originalJapaneseLine":"　というわけで仲直りできました。","translatedEnglishLine":"So, we’ve made up."},{"lineNumber":116520,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ご心配をおかけいたしました」","translatedEnglishLine":"Thank you for your concern.\""},{"lineNumber":116521,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まったく心配はしてないが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I wasn’t worried at all, though...\""},{"lineNumber":116522,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、悪いのユキの方だったろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, Yuki was the one who was at fault.\""},{"lineNumber":116523,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えへへ、いいんです。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ehehe, it’s fine."},{"lineNumber":116524,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いつもこういうとき謝るのは","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s always Kaen’s role to apologize at times like this..."},{"lineNumber":116525,"originalJapaneseLine":"　火炎の役ですし……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\""},{"lineNumber":116526,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それに、火炎ちゃんには分かるんです」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Besides, Kaen-chan understands."},{"lineNumber":116527,"originalJapaneseLine":"「本当はユキちゃんはとっても反省してるって」","translatedEnglishLine":"That deep down, Yuki-chan is really remorseful.\""},{"lineNumber":116528,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それに、火炎とお喋りできなくて、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Also, not being able to chat with Kaen,"},{"lineNumber":116529,"originalJapaneseLine":"　とっても寂しい思いもしてるって」","translatedEnglishLine":"she’s feeling very lonely.\""},{"lineNumber":116530,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh...?\""}]}

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, are you feeling down or something?"
"...No, it's just because I know you guys are fighting,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 知ってるからそう見えるだけか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that's why you just look that way."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日も明日もおはようからおやすみまで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "From morning till night, today and tomorrow,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元気百倍アンバサダー☆
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the energetic ambassador times a hundred☆

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: で、お馴染みのユキちゃんが落ち込むとか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the familiar Yuki-chan getting depressed?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぷぷー、へそでご飯炊けるんですけど」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Pff, you could cook rice with your bellybutton."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ユキちゃんと絶賛絶交状態の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Isn't that Kaen-chan, who's currently in a full-on break-up state with Yuki-chan☆

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火炎ちゃんじゃないですかー☆」
「絶交してるのに声かけても――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even though you’re in a break-up, talking to her—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火炎書士がユキに抱きついた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kaen, the fire mage, hugged Yuki tightly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意地を張ったりしちゃって……
火炎が悪かったの……ごめんね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was Kaen's fault... I'm sorry..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 泣け、わめけ、ユキちゃんの胸で」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cry, scream, here on Yuki-chan's chest."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火炎のこと、許してくれる？」
というわけで仲直りできました。
ご心配をおかけいたしました」
「まったく心配はしてないが……」
「いや、悪いのユキの方だったろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, Yuki was the one who was at fault."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつもこういうとき謝るのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s always Kaen’s role to apologize at times like this...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それに、火炎ちゃんには分かるんです」
「本当はユキちゃんはとっても反省してるって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That deep down, Yuki-chan is really remorseful."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それに、火炎とお喋りできなくて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Also, not being able to chat with Kaen,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とっても寂しい思いもしてるって」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the familiar Yuki-chan getting depressed?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぷぷー、へそでご飯炊けるんですけど」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even though you’re in a break-up, talking to her—"

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kaen, the fire mage, hugged Yuki tightly.

火炎が悪かったの……ごめんね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was Kaen's fault... I'm sorry..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 泣け、わめけ、ユキちゃんの胸で」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cry, scream, here on Yuki-chan's chest."

というわけで仲直りできました。
ご心配をおかけいたしました」
「まったく心配はしてないが……」
「いや、悪いのユキの方だったろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, Yuki was the one who was at fault."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s always Kaen’s role to apologize at times like this...

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That deep down, Yuki-chan is really remorseful."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Also, not being able to chat with Kaen,
